article: thai prime minister samak sundaravej vowed saturday not to resign despite growing pressure for him to step down as anti-government protesters occupied his headquarters for a fifth day and disrupted rail and air service in some of the country 's most popular tourist destinations .
abstract: thai prime minister vows he won t resign
